"The Phantom Demiurge":
"The reading of the almighty Phantom has
returned over Earth's Pacific Ocean.
This reading is unusually strong, so owing
to the mission's danger, only especially
skilled ARKS will be allowed to dispatch.
――――――――――――――――――――
Can clear 1 times, rankings in effect.
Maximum Damage Limit / 999,999
Failure Conditions / Time limit expires,
or five incapacitations between all players"
"We'll begin the operation to defeat the Phantom God that has reappeared over the Pacific Ocean."
"A huge reading, the likes of which we've never seen before, has been observed. We anticipate that this will be a very dangerous assault."
"But if you combine your power together, surely, surely you can overcome this! Please take care of yourselves!"

"Quest Objective [Defeat Deus ESC-A Gracia!]

Quest fails if there are five incapacitations between the entire party."
